tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (DT The) (JJS best) (NN thing)) (PP (IN about) (NP (NP (VBG thanksgiving) (NN dinner)) (PP (IN besides) (NP (NN eating)))))) (VP (VBZ is) (NP (NP (PRP me)) (, ,) (NP (NN mom)) (, ,) (CC and) (NP (NN dad) (NN cooking))) (ADVP (RB together)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN kitchen)))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [me/PRP nsubj>[thing/NN det>The/DT amod>best/JJS nmod:about>[dinner/NN case>about/IN amod>thanksgiving/VBG nmod:besides>[eating/NN case>besides/IN]]] cop>is/VBZ punct>,/, conj:and>mom/NN punct>,/, cc>and/CC conj:and>[cooking/NN compound>dad/NN] advmod>together/RB nmod:in>[kitchen/NN case>in/IN det>the/DT] punct>!/.]
